testcase.name: Student Admission
testcase.system-out: Given a user is on the login page "https://mexil.it/chroma_tech_academy/dev/site/login".passed When user logs in with valid credentials username "general@teacher.com" and password "123456".passed And navigates to Student Information Module.................................passed When user navigates to Bulk Delete submodule................................passed And for Bulk Delete selects Class "SDET" and Section "Testing Fundamentals".passed And clicks search button....................................................passed Then admitted student "Chroma Tech" is deleted for testing purposes.........passed
